entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Leonard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
